name: Cool Headed
description:
Cool Headed is a puzzle casual-programming game.
Combine and use your bots to reach the objective!How to play?
  • Pick a level on the overworld
  • Compose your team
  • Give orders, tweak the timings
  • Deploy!
  • Try again...

Win by having one bot reaching the objective.
Will you have the heart to sacrifice the rest of the team?

Features
  • more then 110 level of progressive difficulty
  • bots with diverse abilities
  • no time pressure and unlimited tries
  • lots of secrets to uncover

Good luck!
